title: AccelFoods and Avendra Announce Strategic Partnership to Bring Innovation to the Hospitality Industry
text:
AccelFoods
NEW YORK , Sept. 9, Early-stage investment platform AccelFoods is excited to announce an exclusive partnership with Avendra, North America's leading procurement services provider for the hospitality and lodging industries. The partnership will highlight AccelFoods' innovative portfolio brands within Avendra's purchasing platform for hotels across the country.
Known for identifying and partnering with the most innovative, emerging food and beverage companies, AccelFoods has grown to make a name for itself in the highly competitive start-up healthy food and beverage industry. By aligning with Avendra, AccelFoods continues to partner with organizations capable of putting its portfolio in the hands of more consumers on a national level. Avendra's newly redesigned customer portal will feature the innovative AccelFoods portfolio.
Formed in 2001 and located in Rockville, MD , Avendra was founded by Marriott International, Hyatt Hotels Corp., Fairmont Hotels & Resorts and ClubCorp with a vision to redefine supply chain management through strategic procurement processes, the use of technology and the counsel of world-class subject matter experts. Avendra gives its customers access to contracts leveraging nearly $4 billion of annual purchases, expert advisory services, and in-depth purchasing data and analysis.
"Avendra is focused on delivering innovation to our customers across all of our food and beverage offerings. We were looking for a partner who could help us expand our offerings and develop programs that will excite consumers," said Carl Levin , Director, Strategic Sourcing & Category Strategy Leader.
"We couldn't be more excited to partner with an organization like Avendra whose reputation speaks for itself," says AccelFoods' Managing Partner Jordan Gaspar on the partnership. "Their commitment to innovation is perfectly in line with the AccelFoods portfolio. We look forward to making this a long and prosperous relationship."
About AccelFoods
AccelFoods is an early-stage investment platform committed to creating outsized returns for founders and investors through an operating team, industry engagement and impact capital. For a full list of AccelFoods' mentors and key partners, and to keep track of its fifteen portfolio companies, visit the AccelFoods website at http://www.accelfoods.com .
About Avendra
Formed in 2001, Avendra is North America's leading procurement services provider serving the hospitality and lodging industries. Avendra customers gain access to contracts leveraging nearly $4 billion of annual purchases, expert advisory services and in-depth purchasing data and analysis. Through Avendra, customers obtain substantial savings on their purchases and other value added services to improve their operations and bottom line results. More than 5,500 hospitality businesses rely on Avendra's procurement solutions to help meet their strategic business initiatives. The company is headquartered in Rockville, Maryland and has regional offices throughout North America . For more information, please call (866) AVENDRA, visit www.avendra.com , or email inquiries to info@avendra.com .
